name: The SuperGroup Creative Omnimedia, Inc.
description:
The SuperGroup is an entertainment-minded digital agency that focuses primarily on creating bold and innovative interactive attractions for promotional purposes. Our approach is to combine the latest technologies with world-class creative ideas and design to gain consumer attention and deliver brand messaging. 
Clients include Coca-Cola, Mellow Mushroom, The U.S. Department of State, Walt Disney World Resort, The Weather Channel, ING, Children’s Hospital Boston, Johnson & Johnson.
